entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
